author: Chad
full_text:
How do you guys have the 469 set up? I've hacked the radio, but do not
have a port into my sound card. Any suggestions of different
configurations that have worked well for you. I'm in Atlanta so we
have a lot of stations and I'm getting what seems like a lot of one
station or another when it scans. Do you find it necessary to mix the
raw audio with white noise?
